batch_narrative: azure_status: new 'Partial Recovery of ongoing Service Degr'.

new.headline: Partial Recovery of ongoing Service Degradation in West US region

content.excerpt_text: We are currently addressing an issue affecting a portion of the West US datacenter. The datacenter experienced an unexpected utility power interruption, and while backup power sources are running, some areas of the facility have not yet fully recovered.Most services are operating normally through healthy zones; however, resources located in impacted sections may experience intermittent availability or delayed monitoring/log data.Our engineering and datacenter teams are actively restoring...

source_payload.html: We are currently addressing an issue affecting a portion of the West US datacenter. The datacenter experienced an unexpected utility power interruption, and while backup power sources are running, some areas of the facility have not yet fully recovered.Most services are operating normally through healthy zones; however, resources located in impacted sections may experience intermittent availability or delayed monitoring/log data.Our engineering and datacenter teams are actively restoring full power and validating the health of dependent systems. More information will be provided in 60 minutes or as events warrant.
